txt.en:
'Do you have a moment, [placeholder]? In all of our recent turmoil, there is something that completely escaped my memory. To the east lies Parth Celebrant, and more importantly, one of my men, Brifard.

'I sent him out with a peasant to gather reeds for Stangard, but he has yet to return. Brifard means well, but sometimes he fails to see the importance of small tasks.

'It would mean a great deal to me if you would track him down. He should be at a small camp in northern Parth Celebrant, just outside Thinglad. You have my thanks.'
'Of course, Stanric would send someone. Come then, let us speak.'
Stanric is troubled by a late delivery from one of his men, Brifard, in Parth Celebrant. He wishes for you to seek out Brifard and discover why he is running so late.
Brifard is stationed at a camp in northern Parth Celebrant near south-east Thinglad.\n\nStanric has asked you to attend to one of his men, Brifard.
